attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: How can the very military persons you have committed to war who then get injured be treated in civilian hospitals, probably by NHS staff who have the very same ethnic orientation as to the country's these wounded personel have just been evacuated from? Surely out of moral decency these wounded need to be treated by experienced military sources at military only designated environments and not some isolated 'Military' ward in a civilian hospital.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
